plugin.name: Spreadsheet Generator
plugin.description:
The Spreadsheet Generator plugin allows exporting attribute data of the city objects stored in the 3D City Database in tabular form as comma-separated values (CSV) or Microsoft Excel (XLSX) file.
  • Provides a graphical user interface for the Importer/Exporter
  • Can also be used on the command-line
  • The 3DCityDB Web Map Client can be easily linked to spreadsheets created with this plugin
Documentation
